Martin, can you please comment how this can happen. I am asking to check if we 
have something to do for 2.1.x

This has already been fixed for 3.0
This walkback can happen when the view gets disposed before createContents is 
called.
I could imagine that is possible with the lazy loading of views.

Fix is trivial.

Created an attachment (id=7252)
Patch that fixes the problem

Reviewed by Martin Aeschlimann and Daniel Megert.

Fixed for 2.1.3
